tgt_original: tayā vinā sadaiva rāgamayaḥ tarūṇyā mahāmudrayā saha ratirantaramanavacchinnānurāgastena vinā kiṃ mahāmudrā labhyate anena manuṣyadeheneti |
manuṣyadehaṃ vihāya dehāntareṇa bodhirna syāt kiṃ satyametat |
je kia ṇiccala maṇa-raaṇa ṇia ghariṇī lai ettha |
soi vājira ṇāhu re mayi vutta paramattha | 31 | | |
jima loṇa vilijjai pāṇiehi tima ghariṇī lai citta |
